TextLibrary.Text: The message has finally been delivered to the Emperor of Selentia.
You have arrived in Emouth, largest Trade Port in the eastern lands, and home to the Selentine Emperor.
The Giant Rat has blocked your progress, but you may try again...
You sneak into the Palace through the sewers, but you find a Giant Rat blocking the way...
You must carry your message to the Imperial Palace in Enmouth.
You must find another way to enter the Imperial Palace.
This Rat is larger than most, and also very fast - it knows the Haste spell.
